channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Poor condition path in most weathers even in mid summer, 22nd August
item.description:
EHU 5 overlooking the A417 This section of path is very muddy and at some seasons of the year is inaccessible. In recent weeks (August 2024) it has been dry much of the length of the path, although there remained a muddy section for perhaps 30 metres. Ideally the whole of this 250 metre section should be restored to make it accessible at all seasons of the year. The fencing alongside the path has recently been funded by Councillor Robert Vines by way of Highways local funding, some form of project funding would be required to restore this section of path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad traffic light sequence, 22nd August
item.description:
Light sequence has been changed and is now causing large traffic buildups for last 2 days. Please restore previous change sequence as many drivers are becoming extremely frustrated and taking risks / queing across the intersection.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Redmarley Road, Oakley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 22nd August
item.description:
Report sent from Tewkesbury Town Council on behalf of customer. We have had a report through from a resident regarding a fallen tree, its come down and hit her wall and she is concerned about the other trees falling. The trees are located near a road so I wasn’t sure whether you might be able to get them looked at? There isn’t anything that I can do from TBC point of view. The trees are roughly here - https://what3words.com/exotic.fraction.coverage (Unable to open the images customer supplied. )
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 22nd August
item.description:
Email received 20/08/2024 - copy attached. Customer reports uneven paving slabs at the location which caused a trip and fall with consequential injuries. The injured party was taken to Cheltenham General Hospital to receive treatment.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Dead tree branch overhanging road., 21st August
item.description:
I've not done a great job of identifying the location. There are approx two large trees on this side of the road. One has a huge dead branch about to snap off from the canopy. It would be big enough to cause serious injury to a driver or pedestrian beneath.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chargrove Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incredibly loud, loose manhole on busy road by houses, 21st August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester

item.title: Road marking lane missing, 21st August
item.description:
After roadworks done on 20/08/2024 there is no do not park Lane painted by the no 8 and 10 driveway. Could You please advise company to put that lane just like they did on no 6. That will prevent blocking those driveways by cars parking on the street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Kingsmead Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Tree is encroaching on road (Brandon Terrace Lane), 21st August
item.description:
A sycamore (?) tree (fast growing) in a back lane. It will soon be making the lane difficult for service vehicles (bin lorries, for example) to access. It is on the west side of the lane across from the rear of 15 Gratton Road (NB there is no 13 Gratton Road).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brandon Terrace Lane, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road
